tier.item: (4) Das Geschäft ist noch immer geöffnet. (German)
the shop is still always opened

the meatballs are fried of the Mary

(45) * I Ariadne exi xasi ta klidia tis mexri tora.
the Ariadne has lost the keys hers until now

(46) I Ariadne dhen exi zisi sto Parisi mexri tora.
the Ariadne not has lived in Paris until now
`?Ariadne has not lived in Paris until now.'
